definition: fire/urgent/ammunition/fiery or flaming/internal heat (Chinese medicine)/hot (popular)/classifier for military units (old)/Kangxi radical 86

sentences.english: In case of fire, don't panic.
Hearing the fire alarm, she made a dash for the door.
sentences.chinese: 一听到火警声，她就往大门奔去。

sentences.english: If the fire-alarm goes, staff should assemble outside the building.
sentences.chinese: 火警警报响时全体人员应到楼外集合。

sentences.english: When the fire alarm sounds, each man rushes to his post.
sentences.chinese: 火警一响，每个人都奔向自己的岗位。

sentences.english: Be aware that the electricity may go out or the sprinkler systems or fire alarms may turn on.
sentences.chinese: 要知道电力有可能停止，喷水装置或火警可能打开。

sentences.english: The all-steel box is deep red with the required signage "Fire Dept Use Only."
sentences.chinese: 键槽是全钢，深红色，并注有“火警专用”的标识。

sentences.english: We lit out of the library when the fire alarm sounded.
sentences.chinese: 火警声响了以后我们立即离开了图书馆。

sentences.english: The red phone was to the airport's duty fire chief .
sentences.chinese: 那个红色电话是打给空港火警值班主任的。

sentences.english: I want to report a fire on 12 Elm Road.
sentences.chinese: 我想要报火警，榆树路12号失火了。

sentences.english: The fire alarm indication panels are at the rear of the bridge.
sentences.chinese: 火警显示面板位于驾驶台的后部。

sentences.english: The fireman: Never has a spark been allowed to exist to develop into a conflagration.
sentences.chinese: 火警说“永远不会让点点星火演变成大火灾”。

sentences.english: Fire alarm displays of holds operational in 10minutes.
sentences.chinese: 货舱的火警显示10分钟后工作。

sentences.english: KA1, KA2 close immediately when first fire alarm.
If there's a fire then you can push the fire alarm.
sentences.chinese: 如果有了火，你就能拉起火警警报器。

sentences.english: As I cooked, the smoke set off the fire alarm.
sentences.chinese: 当我做饭时，烟引起了火警。

definition: to sound an alarm/to report sth to the police
alarm (e.g. burglar or fire alarm)/warning device
